Through conducting projects people with disabilities ge t empowerment and their capacity is built. To be able to measure results and impacts Abilis Foundation will create a system through which a systematic data collection can be carried out from different types of projects their effectiveness and sustainability. The quality assurance of Abilis Foundation includes all these activities aiming a t development and improvement of the Foundation?s work.
